span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 对伦理、法律准则的破坏： a breaking of a moral or legal code
【例】 cheating on the exam was a serious breach of the academy's honor code
【近】 malefaction, transgression, trespass, violation, wrongdoing
【考法 2】 v. 违背： to fail to keep
【例】 a builder being sued for breaching a contract
【近】 contravene, fracture破裂；折断, infringe, transgress
【反】 obey, observe, comply with, conform to 遵守
【记】 ch=k break
